short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count your daily X replies across one or multiple accounts automatically with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track Your Daily Replies with Ease on X

Effortlessly keep count of your daily replies with this lightweight, easy-to-use plugin for X (formerly Twitter). Compatible across platforms like TweetDeck, Twitter Pro, and X, it updates the reply text to display your total replies for the day.

Features:

Quick installation
Works seamlessly on TweetDeck, Twitter Pro, Twitter, and X
Fast setup: simply install and refresh your browser to activate
Created by @fantasmadev on X.
